txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Jagged claws from turtles and toads in northern Bree-land or the rats in the Barrow-downs. Deliver the items to Second-watcher Heathstraw at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
'I think that these will serve the people who made the request very well. Thank you.'
'Now, it may seem strange but there are some who think that the claws from turtles, toads, and rats have medicinal qualities. Those folks posted the request for claws.'
Men of Bree Task: Jagged Claws
Second-watcher Heathstraw is offering compensation for the collection of jagged claws from turtles and toads in northern Bree-land or from the rats in the Barrow-downs.
Deliver the jagged claws to Second-watcher Heathstraw

You have been tasked with finding jagged claws from the turtles and toads in northern Bree-land and rats in the Barrow-downs. Second-watcher Heathstraw awaits the delivery of these items at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
Wanted: Jagged claws from turtles and toads in northern Bree-land or the rats in the Barrow-downs.
